page.title: 13Shops in Reepham
page.content: Reepham has quite a lot of shops. There are severel food shops including 2 butchers,4 grocers,a greengrocers + a health-food and cake shop.The most used shops are the food shops and the Post Office. The less used shops are the Do It Yourself shop and clothes shops. Reepham has two Ironmongers,one of which sells electrical goods.There are three antique shops.One named Hewkes House.The second name'The Chimes'also sells cakes and books.The third sells mostly big antiques like grand piano's and tables and is simply named 'Antiques'. Reepham has enough shops for most needs.Norwich is fairly near so for more specialised objects like computer hardware and musical instruments,you can take a trip into Norwich for the day.
